title: Snowball Introduction – Versatile USB Microphone | Blue Microphones
description: Snowball is a versatile, plug-and-play USB microphone for easily capturing studio-quality audio for vocals, music, multimedia production, gaming and more. The unique dual-capsule design ensures rich, natural sound, while three recording patterns—cardioid, omni, and cardioid with a -10dB pad—provide versatility for recording vocals, instruments, ensembles and even extra-loud sources. Snowball comes with a fully adjustable metal stand and is available in three distinctive finishes: textured white, gloss black and brushed aluminum. And it works automatically with your Mac or PC—no drivers required.
